jhelp.util.stateMachine

Class StateMachine

  • java.lang.Object
    • jhelp.util.thread.ThreadedTask<PARAMETER,java.lang.Void,java.lang.Void>
      • jhelp.util.thread.ThreadedSimpleTask<java.lang.Void>
        • jhelp.util.thread.ThreadedVerySimpleTask
          • jhelp.util.stateMachine.StateMachine

  • public abstract class StateMachine
extends ThreadedVerySimpleTask
    For manage a state machine.
    Extends this class.
    Call doState(int) when you want pass to an other state
    Author:
    JHelp

      • canPass

        protected abstract boolean canPass(int actualState,
              int futureState)
        Called when want check if the passing to a state to an other one is legal
        Parameters:
        actualState - Actual state
        futureState - State that want to go
        Returns:
        true if it is authorize to got from actual state to future state

        Usually it signal a bug

        futureState - Desired state
